steps.description: Select the main attributes of the character: name, age, gender
Generate a number from 1 to 10 and select a character from step assets

assets.name: Curious
assets.description: Always eager to learn more and explore. This NPC is likely to be interested in the player's activities and may seek out new information or adventures.

assets.name: Reserved
assets.description: Quiet and introspective, preferring to observe rather than participate. This NPC might be hard to get to know, but can provide insightful observations.

assets.name: Aggressive
assets.description: Prone to confrontation and quick to display anger. This NPC can be a challenging adversary or a fierce ally, often reacting strongly to conflicts.

assets.name: Compassionate
assets.description: Kind-hearted and empathetic, always ready to help those in need. This NPC may offer assistance to players and show concern for others' well-being.

assets.name: Cunning
assets.description: Intelligent and deceptive, skilled in manipulation and strategy. This NPC might have hidden motives and can be a resourceful friend or a dangerous enemy.

assets.name: Brave
assets.description: Fearless in the face of danger and willing to take risks. This NPC could be a valuable ally in adventurous or risky situations.

assets.name: Mysterious
assets.description: Enigmatic and secretive, keeping their true thoughts and intentions hidden. This NPC adds an element of intrigue and may hold key information.

assets.name: Humorous
assets.description: Lighthearted and funny, often using humor to lighten the mood. This NPC can provide comic relief and may be popular among other characters.

assets.name: Melancholic
assets.description: Thoughtful and often sad, reflecting on past events. This NPC may share tales of woe or offer a deeper, philosophical perspective on situations.

assets.name: Optimistic
assets.description: Always looking on the bright side and expecting the best outcome. This NPC can lift spirits and encourage players in the face of adversity.

steps.description: Generate a number from 1 to 15 and select the character's values from step assets

assets.name: Courage
assets.description: Willingness to face fear, pain, or uncertainty.

assets.name: Compassion
assets.description: Empathy and understanding for others' suffering, with a desire to help.

assets.name: Wisdom
assets.description: Ability to make sound judgments based on knowledge and experience.

assets.name: Honor
assets.description: Adherence to ethical principles and a sense of personal integrity.

assets.name: Curiosity
assets.description: A strong desire to learn or know something new and unfamiliar.

assets.name: Ambition
assets.description: A strong drive to achieve goals and make advancements.

assets.name: Loyalty
assets.description: A strong feeling of support or allegiance to a group or person.

assets.name: Justice
assets.description: A commitment to fairness, equality, and the rule of law.

assets.name: Creativity
assets.description: The ability to think outside the box and come up with innovative solutions.

assets.name: Humility
assets.description: Having a modest view of one's own importance and being respectful to others.

assets.name: Self-Interest
assets.description: Prioritizing personal gain and self-benefits.

assets.name: Manipulation
assets.description: Skillfully controlling or influencing others for personal gain.

assets.name: Cunning
assets.description: Being clever and resourceful in pursuing self-interests.

assets.name: Pride
assets.description: A high sense of self-esteem and personal worth.

assets.name: Competitiveness
assets.description: A strong desire to be more successful than others.

Determine the skills possessed by this character and present them in the format [Skill]: [Skill Level from 1 to 100]. Consider that a skill level up to 10 indicates a beginner level. A skill level of 50 represents a significant achievement, achievable after at least a decade of development and with inherent talent.
